IF YOU WANT TO UPDATE ImGui DELETE ALL FILES IN THIS DIR EXCEPT FOR:

!!! KESTD Readme before changing!!!.txt
CMakeLists.txt
implot.cpp
implot.h
implot_demo.cpp
implod_internal.h
implot_items.cpp

THESE FILES NEED TO STAY THERE AND WILL INTEGRATE WITH THE NEW IMGUI VERSION
IF YOU WANT TO UPDATE ImPlot ONLY DELETE AND REPLACE:

implot.cpp
implot.h
implot_demo.cpp
implod_internal.h
implot_items.cpp
